allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add simplified /documents/markdown endpoint

- New endpoint only requires file input (no complex form fields)
- Supports PDF, DOCX, PPTX, CSV only
- Auto-rejects other file types
- Simpler API for markdown conversion

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix schema error for /documents/markdown endpoint

- Created document_schema.yaml for general document conversion
- Changed document_type from "report" to "document"
- Fixes "Schema not found" error

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Return markdown content directly from /documents/markdown

- Endpoint now returns full markdown content
- Response includes: filename, markdown_content, metadata
- No longer processes chunks, just converts to markdown
- Watermark already removed by MarkdownConverter
- Ready to save to database

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add /documents/chunk endpoint for markdown chunking

- New endpoint accepts markdown_content in request body
- Chunks by: headings (###), numbered items (ƒêi·ªÅu X, I., 1., 2.1.), tables
- Returns: index, title, content, type for each chunk
- Suitable for saving to database with indexing

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve table chunking logic

- 1 table = 1 chunk (complete table as single unit)
- If table has >20 data rows: split into parts
- Each part keeps: original header + table name + part number
- Better handling of large tables for database storage

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Simplify chunking - only extract tables

- Endpoint now ONLY chunks tables, ignores all other content
- Headings tracked for table naming only
- 1 table = 1 chunk (or split if >20 rows)
- Much simpler output for database storage

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add heading hierarchy tracking to table chunks

- Track heading path (II. > 1. > 1.1.) for each table
- New field: heading_path shows full context
- Helps identify table location in document structure
- Better for database indexing and search

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Separate heading hierarchy into individual fields

- Changed from heading_path to separate fields
- heading_level_1, heading_level_2, heading_level_3, heading_level_4
- table_name field for table identifier
- Easier to query and filter in database

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix heading tracking - only numbered headings and tables

- Only track headings with numbers: II., 1., 1.1., 1.1.1.
- Only track "B·∫£ng XX" as table names
- Ignore all other ### text content
- Fixes incorrect heading assignment issue

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix table_name to only use ''B·∫£ng XX'' entries

- Separate numbered headings from table names
- heading_level_X only contains numbered items (I., 1., 1.1.)
- table_name only contains "B·∫£ng XX" entries
- Fixes incorrect table naming issue

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix table collection to skip garbage lines

- Skip non-table lines within table blocks
- Continue collecting if next line is table row
- Fixes issue with watermark/overlay text breaking tables
- Tables now collected completely even with embedded garbage

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Clean up API - keep only 3 endpoints

- Removed unused endpoints (/documents/process, /documents, /chunks, /schemas, etc.)
- Kept only: /, /documents/markdown, /documents/chunk, /health
- Removed unused imports (ProcessDocumentRequest, Chunk, ChunkSearchQuery, etc.)
